thread.title: JSU announces homecoming festivities for Halloween week
thread.title_full: JSU announces homecoming festivities for Halloween week

author: William Thornton | wthornton@al.com
title: JSU announces homecoming festivities for Halloween week
text:
JSU announces homecoming festivities for Halloween week JSU homecoming.PNG Cocky the Gamecock waves to fans during a recent Homecoming Parade. The 2015 parade will take place on Oct. 31 at 10:30 a.m. (Matt Reynolds) 
Homecoming for Jacksonville State University falls on Halloween, and the campus has a host of activities scheduled for the last two weeks of the month leading up to the big game. 
JSU takes on Eastern Kentucky at 1 p.m. Oct. 31 at JSU Stadium. 
Other activities include: 
Oct. 14: Homecoming Pageant, 7 p.m., Leone Cole Auditorium. 
Oct. 29: Calhoun County Alumni and Friends Wine Tasting, 6 p.m., at Zoe's on the Lake; Homecoming Pep Rally, 8 p.m., JSU Stadium. 
Oct. 30: Class of 1965 50-Year Golden Gamecock Reunion, Noon, Houston Cole Library; Sixties Group annual reunion, 5:30 p.m., McClellan; ROTC Alumni Banquet, 6 p.m., Houston Cole Library; Students Today Alumni Tomorrow/Student Alumni Association (STAT/SAA), 10-year reunion, 6:30 p.m., Alumni House; NPHC Step Show, 7 p.m., Leone Cole Auditorium, $5 admission in advance, $10 at the door 
Activities scheduled for Homecoming Day, Oct. 31.: 
1955 Refrigerator Bowl Team Reunion, 8:30 a.m., Alumni House. 
Alumni Association general membership meeting, 8:30 a.m., TMB Auditorium. 
Open House at the College of Commerce and Business Administration, Department of Communications and Honors House, 9 to 10 a.m. 
Homecoming Open House at Alumni House, 9 a.m. to 12 p.m. 
Homecoming Parade, 10:30 a.m. 
SGA Tailgate, Dillon Field, 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. 
SGA Family Day, 9 a.m. to 1 p.m., TMB Lawn. Activities will include tactical laser tag, construct-a-bear, sand art, wax fun, a photo booth and a caricature artist. 
JSU Encore Show Choir and Gospel Choir combined performance, 10 a.m., Mason Hall Performance Center. 
SGA Tailgate Concert featuring Matt Carroll and the Browncoats, 11 a.m. to 1 p.m., Dillon Field. 
JSU Gamecocks vs. Eastern Kentucky Colonels, 1 p.m., Burgess-Snow Field. 
The following day, Nov. 1, will feature the annual UN Day Tea at 2 p.m., featuring food and customs from across the globe, presented by JSU's international students. 
For more information, contact Alumni Relations at 256-782-5404 or visit the alumni page.
